c74object.name: fl.random~
c74object.digest: Generates frames of linearly distributed random values in the range [0-1].
c74object.description:
The size of the output is dependent on the mode.
The output size may either be set as a parameter, or be set to match that of the triggering input.

entry.name: 1. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Controls how the output length is determined:
[0] - requested: the output frame size is set by the length parameter.
[1] - input: the output frame size will match the input size.

entry.name: 2. /length [int]
entry.description:
Sets the length of the output when the mode is set to requested.
Set in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 3. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units for specified output lengths:
[0] - samples
[1] - ms
[2] - seconds
